# openproject Provider

## Example Usage

```terraform
variable "url" {}
variable "apikey" {}

provider "openproject" {
  app_url = var.url
  apikey  = var.apikey
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `apikey` (String, Sensitive) API key for OpenProject
- `app_url` (String) OpenProject API base URL
